label: Session
description: Ephemeral memory lasting only for the duration of the current interaction.

label: Short-Term
description: Persisted across sessions for hours to days, useful for task continuity.

label: Long-Term
description: Stores enduring user data, preferences, and patterns over weeks or more.

label: Shared
description: Cross-agent or team-wide memory accessible by multiple components.

label: Project
description: Scoped to a specific project or workspace to preserve focus and relevance.
